search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Recruitee (recruitee.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Recruitee can be found at: [https://recruitee.com/pricing](https://recruitee.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
All features compared
---------------------

Organize your recruitment

5 Job slots

Unlimited job slots

Unlimited users

Candidate pipeline

Job boards (Multi-posting)

Smart campaigns

Audit logs

Talentpools

Apply with Indeed

Apply with Linked-in

Careershub - Single Page

Careershub - Full (Landing pages)

Custom CareersSite URL

Jobs widget

Candidate video (video interviewing)

Overdue candidate reminders

Track candidate information

GDPR Compliance

GDPR Automations

EEO Compliance

Two-way calendar sync

Two-way email sync

Calendar meeting rooms

Marketplace

Team notes, tasks, mentions

Automated Actions

Automated emails

Send Later

Knockout-questions

Screening questions

Event scheduler

Job scheduler

Adjustable Workflow

Email Templates

Workflow Templates

Basic reporting dashboards

Standard reports and analytics

Customizable reports and analytics

Parse and search CV's

Profile print

Role-based access and notifications

Adjustable visibility options (limit visibility of field content)

Quick evaluations

Evaluation forms

Questionaires

ReferralsHub

Multi-locations

Multi-language & page careers site and jobs (Multi-lang)

Fair evaluations

Hide evaluations from team members until the right time.

Texting

Text candidates from their profile

Requsition Approvals

Testing sandbox

Webhooks access

API Access

Chrome Extension (sourcing extension)

2FA authorization

SSO

Mobile app

Bi connector

Live-chat and support

External imports from ATS

Onboarding - Support/CSM

Self-service onboarding - in app

Team Consultations

Dedicated CSM

API Support

Start

5

**Attract & interview  
**

Job slots

Multi-job posting

Post jobs to multiple job boards at once and optimize your budget.

Smart campaigns

Get recommendations for the most suitable job boards and their prices.

Chrome sourcing extension

Easily add potential candidates to a job or talent pool.

CareersHub (single-page)

Create a single-page careers site that showcases your employer brand without any coding.

CareersHub (multi-page)

Create a multi-page and multi-language careers site to showcase your brand and attract the best talent.

Custom careers site URL

AI for job descriptions

Get help from AI to create compelling descriptions for your target candidates.

Multi-languages

Reach candidates in multiple languages.

Multi-locations

Manage locations for your organization and assign them to jobs.

ReferralsHub

Get your entire organization involved in sourcing talent by setting up a referral program.

Event scheduler

Allow candidates to choose a time slot that suits everyone involved in the interview.

Remote interviewing

Sync with Zoom, Google Meet, and Microsoft Teams to conduct remote interviews.

Questionnaires

Use questionnaires to screen candidates and get the answers you need.

Screening questions

Set up screening questions to filter candidates faster.

Quick evaluations

Leave short feedback about a candidate on their profile.

Evaluation forms

Fill out detailed feedback about a candidate on their profile.

Texting

Text candidates directly from their profiles.

Start

5

**Collaborate & hire  
**

Unlimited users

Get everyone involved in the hiring process to bring talent in faster.

Pipeline templates

Set up templates for pipelines to streamline and standardize your hiring process.

Team notes, tasks & mentions

Leave notes, send task reminders or tag colleagues, so you’re all on the same page.

Email & calendar sync

Send and receive emails and schedule interviews within Recruitee.

Requisition approvals

Get approval for a new role or replacement in your company.

Talent pools

Store potential candidates for future job openings.

Mobile app

Manage your pipeline, track candidates, and communicate with your team wherever you are.

Unbiased hiring

Reduce bias by anonymizing candidate resumes and increase team objectivity with fair evaluations.

**Automate & improve  
**

Automated emails

Pipeline automations

Automate repetitive actions you take when moving candidates from one stage to the next.

Set up email automations based on specific triggers.

GDPR automations

Automate consent requests and candidate deletion to save time.

Parse and search CVs

Extract data like name, job title, and education from a candidate’s CV.

Knockout questions

Automatically disqualify candidates who don’t fit your job’s requirements.

Standard reporting & analytics

Choose from a selection of ready-made templates to analyze your data effortlessly.

Custom reporting & analytics

Track what matters most for your hiring process with tailor-made reports and customizable boards.

Marketplace of 170+ integrations

Connect Recruitee to HRIS, assessment tools, and more to supercharge your hiring.

API connection

Use our public API to automate your workflow and integrate with your website and other software.

BI connector

Connect Recruitee to your favorite BI tool for more advanced data insights.

Webhooks access

Automatically send messages to connected tools when actions happen in Recruitee.

Testing sandbox

Automatically send messages to connected tools when actions happen in Recruitee.

Anonymous candidates

Reduce bias by anonymizing candidate resumes.

**Security & support  
**

Customizable user access & 2FA

Give access and visibility based on roles and protect your account with two-factor authentication.

Onboarding support

Get help setting up your Recruitee account in the most efficient way.

Live chat & support

We’re always there for you. Just click the (?) icon in the top right corner of the web app.

Customer success manager

Get the most out of Recruitee with the help of a CSM.

Compliance (EEOC & GDPR)

Stay compliant with EEOC and GDPR regulations while using Recruitee.

Single sign-on (SSO)

Establish a secure connection to Recruitee with Single sign-on.

Audit logs

Keep track of the events and changes that took place in your Recruitee account in the last 30 days.
